name: Untitled Ghost Game (Techno19, Proto_Emerald, Asledorf, Xi-Xi Kaisoku)
name_original: Untitled Ghost Game (Techno19, Proto_Emerald, Asledorf, Xi-Xi Kaisoku)
description:
You are totally blind and must rely on sound to find your way around. Use WASD to move around. Press Space to make a click in order to see around you. Be careful though, as something can hear you too.

Multiplayer not implemeted.

Asset Credits:

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/vk-house-04-80537
